Reviews.Title: My son and daughter-in-law love it!
Reviews.Author: Gale S. Fossett
Reviews.Content: I have two young grandchildren and my son and daughter-in-law had needed a new camera desperately.  You just can't take decent pictures of babies on a cell phone!  I researched the web (and talked to camera store employees) and narrowed it down to the Canon PowerShot G15.  You should see the fine quality pictures I'm getting and my family says it's very easy to use.  They love it!

Reviews.Title: Love the camera not sure about some other items
Reviews.Author: RGB
Reviews.Content: I thought the kit would have more useful items. Cleaning things are ok. Don't know about the small tripod. The extra battery is the best part. Probably should have gotten the camera, cable and extra battery, not this kit. The camera is excellent. Too bad it doesn't come with a user manual. Had to buy a book.

Reviews.Title: Great for non photographers
Reviews.Author: Cornhusker
Reviews.Content: I needed something to take great photos for a web site. A photographer friend recommended this camera. I still don't know what all the dials are for. However, I set it on Auto, and even with no flash and low ambient light, the pictures are amazing. Getting the extra battery and chargers and other extras for one price are a bonus. The camera bag is very nice, better than the one in the photo. I am very pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: William Lewis
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  It is lightweight without feeling cheap.  Just out of the box the camera takes better pictures than our little point and shoot.  If you are into amateur photography this camera would be a great choice.  The other parts of the package are just extras.  Two chargers and two batteries came with it which alone makes it worth more than the package not including the other items.  Great item! Very Pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great Package
Reviews.Author: Judith
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.  The price was good for the package.  Just for the extra battery and charger alone, it was a good price.  but I got even more with the package...tripod, reader & sd card.  Real happy with the purchase over all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Sola
Reviews.Content: This camera exceeded my expectations. Easy to use, lots of functions and awesome image quality. The macro is incredible. Highly recommended!.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Camila Mieko Kirihara
Reviews.Content: G15 exceeded my expectations. Compact, easy to handle and your old-style is very attractive. Excellent image quality. Good choice for backpacker.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera, kit no so much
Reviews.Author: michelle
Reviews.Content: consthe tripod is weak, even for a small tripodthe case is huge, useless for this camera.proscharger is great for traveling as you can use it all around the world (voltage wise)car reader is helpful as well

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Sara Schmidt
Reviews.Content: amazing camera, so tiny and so effective, love it, and al, the gear included, I am very pleased, thanks a lot
